snippet: A plan to create a Meadowlands Regional Commission that would take final control over development from the state’s environmental department has generated concerns.
abstract: Supporters of Liberty State Park in Jersey City are leery of legislation that would have new Meadowlands Regional Commission take over control of the park's preservation and development from the state's environmental department; Gov Chris Christie has until early February to act on measure.
lead_paragraph: A plan to create a Meadowlands Regional Commission that would take final control over development from the state’s environmental department has generated concerns.

headline.main: Fans of Liberty State Park Leery of Proposed Agency
headline.print_headline: Fans of Liberty State Park Leery of Proposed Agency
